item.description: Paul Rice will be talking about communicating with the body. He will help us travel through the body as we have never before. He will discuss what the mind does with an injured body part and how that part responds. He will show us how to have a conversation with an injured body part. We will learn what the injured part knows. Paul will also be discussing how to converse with someone else's injured body part. He will explain to us how to be a bridge for that body part when the mind does not want to listen and how to help that body part heal. He will also be teaching about Neural nets, how to reduce pain by attention and wake up your feeling sense with gems. A small donation is always appreciated to help support the Buttonwood Tree.
item.how_to_find_us: Members do not need to find me, Paul will be teaching the class.
item.name: Developing Psychic Skills with Paul Rice
